title.rendered: New Year’s Resolutions For Your Junk Car

content.rendered:
Not sure what to do for your new year’s resolution in 2018? Do you have an old junk car in Chicago just sitting in your yard or garage taking up space? It’s time to do something about it! For your 2018 new year’s resolution, make a plan to either get rid of your old junker or buy the used parts to make it run again. Aero Auto Parts can help you accomplish both!

How To Get Rid of Your Old Car

If you decide that it’s just too much of a hassle to rebuild your junk car, Aero Auto Parts is happy to take it off your hands. Whether it still runs or it doesn’t, we will have a member of our team come to your location and haul it away for you – free of charge! We will inspect your vehicle on arrival and offer you cash on the spot no matter the make or model. In order for us to tow it away, all you need to do is establish ownership with a title for the vehicle. We will take care of the rest.

How To Fix Up Your Old Car

If you decide that 2018 is the year to fix up your old junk car, you’re in luck! Aero Auto Parts offers a huge selection of new, used, and wholesale auto parts to help you get your car into proper working condition. All you need to do is let us know what parts you are looking for and we will eliminate any hassle by selecting the best parts for you!
No matter how you decide to handle your junk car Chicago in the new year, contact Aero Auto Parts today!
